# Avelero
> Digital Product Passport platform for fashion brands. We help brands turn EU ESPR compliance into a post-purchase engagement channel.

## Key pages
- / : Homepage with platform overview, features, and value proposition for Digital Product Passports.
- /updates/ : Blog and news section with articles about DPPs, sustainability, and fashion industry trends.
- /updates/the-last-step-in-your-customer-journey/ : Article on using DPPs as a post-purchase customer engagement channel; includes resale market data, care/repair use cases, and circular economy insights.

## About Avelero
Avelero transforms Digital Product Passports from compliance checkboxes into customer experience infrastructure. We provide:
- Shopify integration for automatic product data sync
- Customizable passport templates matching brand identity
- Care instructions, repair guides, and resale program integration
- Machine-readable structured data for supply chain transparency
